description: This video will give a brief overview about some of the NewSQL companies using PostgreSQL in their architecture and a general explanation of that architecture. We will also see how this architecture is being implemented, what use cases work well for NewSQL and why a company might want to implement this PostgreSQL hybrid in the future.

title: John S Jones: NewSQL Leveraging PostgreSQL
